name: The Feathered Fish's Treasure Chase
description:
These birds aren't just any birds. These birds are dastardly pirates searching for the greatest booty of them all - a wish, given by the mystical and elusive skywhale that roams their land. But they aren't the only gang of swashbuckling skyfarers who have spotted the colorful beast of the heavens - they'll have to go head to head with other flocks to get their deepest darkest desires fulfilled.

This version represents a demo of many of the elements that we would like to include in the final game, including bullet dodging action and multiple unique types of cannonballs.

Controls: 

Move with WASD, arrow keys or gamepad joystick/d-pad 

Shoot with space or the south gamepad button (A for XBOX, X for PS, etc.)
